1: דִּבְרֵ֣י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The words</n> עָמ֔וֹס <sup>5986 </sup> <n>of Amos</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>was among</n> בַנֹּקְדִ֖ים <sup>5349 </sup> <n>who was among the herdmen</n> מִתְּק֑וֹעַ <sup>8620 </sup> <n>of Tekoa</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> חָזָ֨ה <sup>2372 </sup> <n>which he saw</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>concerning Israel</n> בִּימֵ֣י ׀ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the days</n> עֻזִּיָּ֣ה <sup>5818 </sup> <n>of Uzziah</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֗ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וּבִימֵ֞י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and in the days</n> יָרָבְעָ֤ם <sup>3379 </sup> <n>of Jeroboam</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יוֹאָשׁ֙ <sup>3101 </sup> <n>of Joash</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> שְׁנָתַ֖יִם <sup>8141 </sup> <n>two years</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָרָֽעַשׁ׃ <sup>7494 </sup> <n>the earthquake</n>
2: וַיֹּאמַ֓ר ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> מִצִּיּ֣וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>from Zion</n> יִשְׁאָ֔ג <sup>7580 </sup> <n>will roar</n> וּמִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>from Jerusalem</n> יִתֵּ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and utter</n> קוֹל֑וֹ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> וְאָֽבְלוּ֙ <sup>56 </sup> <n>shall mourn</n> נְא֣וֹת <sup>4999 </sup> <n>and the habitations</n> הָרֹעִ֔ים <sup>7462 </sup> <n>of the shepherds</n> וְיָבֵ֖שׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>shall wither</n> רֹ֥אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>and the top</n> הַכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <sup>3760 </sup> <n>of Carmel</n> פ
3: כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>For three</n> פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <sup>6588 </sup> <n>transgressions</n> דַמֶּ֔שֶׂק <sup>1834 </sup> <n>of Damascus</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>and for four</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>I will not turn away</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> דּוּשָׁ֛ם <sup>1758 </sup> <n>[the punishment] thereof because they have threshed</n> בַּחֲרֻצ֥וֹת <sup>2742 </sup> <n>with threshing instruments</n> הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>of iron</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n>
4: וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>But I will send</n> אֵ֖שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> בְּבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> חֲזָאֵ֑ל <sup>2371 </sup> <n>of Hazael</n> וְאָכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>which shall devour</n> אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <sup>759 </sup> <n>the palaces</n> בֶּן־ הֲדָֽד׃ <sup>1130 </sup> <n>of Benhadad</n>
5: וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <sup>7665 </sup> <n>I will break</n> בְּרִ֣יחַ <sup>1280 </sup> <n>also the bar</n> דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <sup>1834 </sup> <n>of Damascus</n> וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and cut off</n> יוֹשֵׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>the inhabitant</n> מִבִּקְעַת־ <sup>1237 </sup> <n>from the plain</n> אָ֔וֶן <sup>206 </sup> <n>of Aven</n> וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <sup>8551 </sup> <n>and him that holdeth</n> שֵׁ֖בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>the sceptre</n> מִבֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>from the house</n> עֶ֑דֶן <sup>5730 </sup> <n>delicate</n> וְגָל֧וּ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>shall go into captivity</n> עַם־ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and the people</n> אֲרָ֛ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> קִ֖ירָה <sup>7024 </sup> <n>unto Kir</n> אָמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> פ
6: כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>For three</n> פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <sup>6588 </sup> <n>transgressions</n> עַזָּ֔ה <sup>5804 </sup> <n>of Gaza</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>and for four</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>I will not turn away</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> הַגְלוֹתָ֛ם <sup>1540 </sup> <n>[the punishment] thereof because they carried away captive</n> גָּל֥וּת <sup>1546 </sup> <n>captivity</n> שְׁלֵמָ֖ה <sup>8003 </sup> <n>the whole</n> לְהַסְגִּ֥יר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>to deliver [them] up</n> לֶאֱדֽוֹם׃ <sup>123 </sup> <n>to Edom</n>
7: וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>But I will send</n> אֵ֖שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <sup>2346 </sup> <n>on the wall</n> עַזָּ֑ה <sup>5804 </sup> <n>of Gaza</n> וְאָכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>which shall devour</n> אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>759 </sup> <n>the palaces</n>
8: וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <sup>3772 </sup> <n>And I will cut off</n> יוֹשֵׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>the inhabitant</n> מֵֽאַשְׁדּ֔וֹד <sup>795 </sup> <n>from Ashdod</n> וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <sup>8551 </sup> <n>and him that holdeth</n> שֵׁ֖בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>the sceptre</n> מֵֽאַשְׁקְל֑וֹן <sup>831 </sup> <n>from Ashkelon</n> וַהֲשִׁיב֨וֹתִי <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and I will turn</n> יָדִ֜י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>mine hand</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> עֶקְר֗וֹן <sup>6138 </sup> <n>against Ekron</n> וְאָֽבְדוּ֙ <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>and the remnant</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> פ
9: כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>For three</n> פִּשְׁעֵי־ <sup>6588 </sup> <n>transgressions</n> צֹ֔ר <sup>6865 </sup> <n>of Tyrus</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>and for four</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>I will not turn away</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> הַסְגִּירָ֞ם <sup>5462 </sup> <n>[the punishment] thereof because they delivered up</n> גָּל֤וּת <sup>1546 </sup> <n>captivity</n> שְׁלֵמָה֙ <sup>8003 </sup> <n>the whole</n> לֶאֱד֔וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>to Edom</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> זָכְר֖וּ <sup>2142 </sup> <n>and remembered</n> בְּרִ֥ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> אַחִֽים׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>not the brotherly</n>
10: וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>But I will send</n> אֵ֖שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> בְּח֣וֹמַת <sup>2346 </sup> <n>on the wall</n> צֹ֑ר <sup>6865 </sup> <n>of Tyrus</n> וְאָכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>which shall devour</n> אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>759 </sup> <n>the palaces</n> פ
11: כֹּ֚ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>For three</n> פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <sup>6588 </sup> <n>transgressions</n> אֱד֔וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <sup>702 </sup> <n>and for four</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>I will not turn away</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>its Because</n> רָדְפ֨וֹ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>[the punishment] thereof because he did pursue</n> בַחֶ֤רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with the sword</n> אָחִיו֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <sup>7843 </sup> <n>and did cast off</n> רַחֲמָ֔יו <sup>7356 </sup> <n>all pity</n> וַיִּטְרֹ֤ף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>did tear</n> לָעַד֙ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>perpetually</n> אַפּ֔וֹ <sup>639 </sup> <n>and his anger</n> וְעֶבְרָת֖וֹ <sup>5678 </sup> <n>his wrath</n> שְׁמָ֥רָה <sup>8104 </sup> <n>and he kept</n> נֶֽצַח׃ <sup>5331 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
12: וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>But I will send</n> אֵ֖שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>a fire</n> בְּתֵימָ֑ן <sup>8487 </sup> <n>upon Teman</n> וְאָכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>which shall devour</n> אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <sup>759 </sup> <n>the palaces</n> בָּצְרָֽה׃ <sup>1224 </sup> <n>of Bozrah</n> פ
